page.title: 06The jobs the people do.
page.content: Most people in the area work on either farms or market gardens. A few people work at Huntapac a prepacking firm who employ over 200 people.Most of their workers come from surrounding villages. They wash carrots and prepack vegetables for the large Supermarkets as well as taking produce to market. The farmers grow mainly corn, potatoes, carrots and green vegetables. The market gardeners grow tomatoes, lettuce and cucumbers. One grower in the area grows courgettes, marrows, fennel, pumpkins and spinach. There is a gamekeeper who rears 500 partridge each year which are released back on to the Lilford Estates at Tarleton and Bretherton. There is a joiner who does repairs and a garage where one man repairs peoples tractors and cars and Haulage firm.
